ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 9 items, Camera includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Zoom Lens and Full HD 1080p Video - Plum (import, backed by Hot Deals Electronics 1 year guarantee)
8 Gigabyte SDHC (Secure Digital High Capacity) Memory Card - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Well Padded Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pockets, & Neck Strap - HDMI Cable for High Definition TV connection
Flexible Mini Table Top Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth (the most effective way to clean all optical surfaces)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Zoom Lens & HD Video - Plum (Import) + 8pc Bundle 8GB Accessory Kit w/ HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth
